item.title: Control Flow
item.description: Conditional statements Conditional statements are used to execute different code based on certain conditions. If The if statement evaluates a condition and executes a block of code if that condition is True. 1x = 10 2if x > 5: 3 print("x is greater than 5") Else The else statement is used with an if statement to define code that will be executed if the condition is False. 1x = 3 2if x > 5: 3 print("x is greater than 5") 4else: 5 print("x is not greater than 5") Elif The elif (else if) statement allows you to check multiple conditions.
